author: andschwa
body:
This is an issue to track our external blocker with the .NET CLI tools, which still do not support NGEN'ing libraries.

This is a massive performance hit, and must be addressed.

comments.author: jpsnover
comments.body: What are we blocked on?  My understanding is that they have tools (crossgen?) that will do this for us.

comments.author: SandeepSutari
comments.body: @Francisco-Gamino Can you please investigate this after you are done with your current items

title: Native Image Generation for PowerShell libraries
